00027 // GENERAL CONSTRUCTOR
00028 //
00047 
00048 CarProblem::CarProblem(MultilayerPerceptron* newMultilayerPerceptron)
00049 : ObjectiveFunctional(newMultilayerPerceptron)
00050 {
00051    // Control sentence
00052 
00053    int numberOfInputs = multilayerPerceptron->getNumberOfInputs();
00054    int numberOfOutputs = multilayerPerceptron->getNumberOfOutputs();
00055 
00056    if(numberOfInputs != 1 || numberOfOutputs != 2)
00057    {
00058       std::cerr << std::endl
00059                 << "Flood Error: CarProblem class." << std::endl
00060                 << "CarProblem(MultilayerPerceptron*) constructor." << std::endl
00061                 << "Number of inputs and outputs in multilayer perceptron must be 1 and 2, respectively." 
00062                 << std::endl
00063                 << std::endl;
00064 
00065       exit(1);
00066    }
00067 
00068    int numberOfIndependentParameters = multilayerPerceptron->getNumberOfIndependentParameters();
00069 
00070    if(numberOfIndependentParameters != 1)
00071    {
00072       std::cerr << std::endl
00073                 << "Flood Error: CarProblem class." << std::endl
00074                 << "CarProblem(MultilayerPerceptron*) constructor." << std::endl
00075                 << "Number of independent parameters of multilayer perceptron must be 1." << std::endl
00076                 << std::endl;
00077 
00078       exit(1);
00079    }
00080    
00081    initialPosition = 0.0;
00082    initialVelocity = 0.0;
00083 
00084    finalPositionGoal = 1.0;
00085    finalVelocityGoal = 0.0;
00086 
00087    maximumAcceleration = 1.0;
00088    maximumDeceleration = 1.0;
00089    
00090    finalPositionErrorWeight = 1.0;
00091    finalVelocityErrorWeight = 1.0;
00092 
00093    finalTimeWeight = 1.0e-9;
00094 
00095    tolerance = 1.0e-15;
00096    initialSize = 1000;
00097 
00098    ordinaryDifferentialEquations.setTolerance(tolerance);
00099    ordinaryDifferentialEquations.setInitialSize(initialSize);
00100 }

00315 // void setMaximumAcceleration(double) method
00316 
00321 
00322 void CarProblem::setMaximumAcceleration(double newMaximumAcceleration)
00323 {
00324    // Control sentence
00325 
00326    if(newMaximumAcceleration <= 0.0)
00327    {
00328       std::cerr << std::endl
00329                 << "Flood Error: CarProblem class."
00330                 << "void setMaximumAcceleration(double) method." << std::endl
00331                 << "The maximum acceleration must be greater than zero." << std::endl
00332                 << std::endl;
00333 
00334       exit(1);
00335    }
00336 
00337    // Set maximum acceleration
00338 
00339    maximumAcceleration = newMaximumAcceleration;
00340 }

00350 void CarProblem::setMaximumDeceleration(double newMaximumDeceleration)
00351 {
00352    // Control sentence
00353 
00354    if(newMaximumDeceleration >= 0.0)
00355    {
00356       std::cerr << std::endl
00357                 << "Flood Error: CarProblem class."
00358                 << "void setMaximumDeceleration(double) method." << std::endl
00359                 << "The maximum deceleration must be less than zero." << std::endl
00360                 << std::endl;
00361 
00362       exit(1);
00363    }
00364 
00365    // Set maximum acceleration
00366 
00367    maximumDeceleration = newMaximumDeceleration;
00368 }

00518 // double calculatePositionDot(double, double, double) method
00519 
00526 
00527 double CarProblem::calculatePositionDot(double time, double position, double velocity)
00528 {
00529    double positionDot = velocity;
00530 
00531    return(positionDot);
00532 }
00533 
00534 
00535 // double calculateVelocityDot(double, double, double) method
00536 
00543 
00544 double CarProblem::calculateVelocityDot(double time, double position, double velocity)
00545 {
00546    Vector<double> input(1);
00547    input[0] = time;
00548 
00549    Vector<double> output = multilayerPerceptron->calculateOutput(input);
00550 
00551    double acceleration = output[0];
00552 
00553    if(acceleration < 0.0)
00554    {
00555       acceleration = 0.0;                
00556    }
00557    else if(acceleration > maximumAcceleration)
00558    {
00559       acceleration = maximumAcceleration;                
00560    }
00561 
00562    double deceleration = output[1];
00563 
00564    if(deceleration < -1.0*maximumDeceleration)
00565    {
00566       deceleration = -1.0*maximumDeceleration;                
00567    }
00568    else if(deceleration > 0.0)
00569    {
00570       deceleration = 0.0;                
00571    }
00572 
00573    double velocityDot = acceleration + deceleration;
00574 
00575    return(velocityDot);
00576 }
00577 
00578 
00579 // double calculateEvaluation(void) method
00580 
00582 
00583 double CarProblem::calculateEvaluation(void)
00584 {
00585     // Control sentence 
00586 
00587    if(multilayerPerceptron == NULL)
00588    {
00589       std::cerr << std::endl
00590                 << "Flood Error: CarProblem class." << std::endl
00591                 << "double calculateEvaluation(void) method." << std::endl
00592                 << "Pointer to multilayer perceptron object cannot be NULL." << std::endl
00593                 << std::endl;
00594 
00595       exit(1);
00596    }
00597 
00598    double evaluation = 0.0;
00599    
00600    // Increment number of evaluations
00601 
00602    numberOfEvaluations++;
00603 
00604    // Evaluate objective functional
00605 
00606    int numberOfIndependentParameters 
00607    = multilayerPerceptron->getNumberOfIndependentParameters();
00608 
00609    if(numberOfIndependentParameters != 1)
00610    {
00611       std::cout << std::endl
00612                 << "Flood Error CarProblem class." << std::endl
00613                 << "calculateEvaluation(void) method." << std::endl
00614                 << "Number of independent parameters in multilayer perceptron must be one." << std::endl
00615                 << std::endl;
00616 
00617       exit(1);                         
00618    }
00619 
00620    Vector<double> independentParameters = multilayerPerceptron->getIndependentParameters();
00621 
00622    double initialTime = 0.0;
00623    double finalTime = independentParameters[0];
00624 
00625    if(finalTime < 0.0)
00626    {
00627       finalTime = 0.0;             
00628    }
00629 
00630    Vector<double> time;
00631    Vector<double> position;
00632    Vector<double> velocity;
00633 
00634    int numberOfPoints = 
00635    ordinaryDifferentialEquations.calculateRungeKuttaFehlbergIntegral(*this,
00636    time, position, velocity, 
00637    &CarProblem::calculatePositionDot,
00638    &CarProblem::calculateVelocityDot,
00639    initialTime, finalTime, initialPosition, initialVelocity);
00640 
00641    // Obtain final position and velocity errors
00642 
00643    double finalPositionError = fabs(finalPositionGoal - position[numberOfPoints-1]);
00644    double finalVelocityError = fabs(finalVelocityGoal - velocity[numberOfPoints-1]);
00645 
00646    // Calculate evaluation
00647 
00648    evaluation
00649    = finalTimeWeight*finalTime
00650    + finalPositionErrorWeight*pow(finalPositionError, 2)
00651    + finalVelocityErrorWeight*pow(finalVelocityError, 2);
00652 
00653    return(evaluation);
00654 }

00656 
00657 // void saveResults(char*) method
00658 
00671 
00672 void CarProblem::saveResults(char* filename)
00673 {
00674    std::fstream file; 
00675 
00676    file.open(filename, std::ios::out);
00677    
00678     if(!file.is_open())
00679     {
00680        std::cout << std::endl
00681                  << "Cannot open car problem results data file."  
00682                  << std::endl << std::endl;
00683 
00684        exit(1);
00685     }
00686     else
00687     {
00688        if(display)
00689       {
00690           std::cout << std::endl
00691                     << "Saving car problem results to data file..." << std::endl;
00692       }
00693     }
00694 
00695    int numberOfPoints = 1001;
00696 
00697    ordinaryDifferentialEquations.setNumberOfPoints(numberOfPoints);
00698 
00699    // Solve state equations 
00700 
00701    Vector<double> time(numberOfPoints);
00702    Vector<double> position(numberOfPoints);
00703    Vector<double> velocity(numberOfPoints);
00704 
00705    Vector<double> independentParameters 
00706     = multilayerPerceptron->getIndependentParameters();
00707 
00708    double initialTime = 0.0;
00709    double finalTime = independentParameters[0];
00710 
00711    if(finalTime < 0.0)
00712    {
00713       finalTime = 0.0;             
00714    }
00715           
00716    ordinaryDifferentialEquations.getRungeKuttaIntegral(*this,
00717    time, position, velocity, 
00718    &CarProblem::calculatePositionDot,
00719    &CarProblem::calculateVelocityDot,
00720    initialTime, finalTime, initialPosition, initialVelocity);
00721 
00722    double finalPosition = position[numberOfPoints-1];
00723    double finalPositionError = finalPositionGoal - finalPosition;
00724 
00725    double finalVelocity = velocity[numberOfPoints-1];
00726    double finalVelocityError = finalVelocityGoal - finalVelocity;
00727 
00728    // Obtain control 
00729 
00730    Vector<double> input(1);
00731    Vector<double> output(2);
00732 
00733    double acceleration = 0.0;
00734    double deceleration = 0.0;
00735 
00736     // Write header 
00737 
00738    file << "% Flood Neural Network. Car problem results data file." << std::endl
00739         << "% Final time: " << finalTime << std::endl
00740         << "% Final position error: " << finalPositionError << std::endl
00741         << "% Final velocity error: " << finalVelocityError << std::endl
00742         << "% Column data:" << std::endl
00743         << "%  1 - Time" << std::endl
00744         << "%  2 - Position" << std::endl
00745         << "%  3 - Velocity" << std::endl
00746         << "%  4 - Acceleration" << std::endl
00747         << "%  5 - Deceleration" << std::endl
00748         << std::endl;
00749 
00750    for(int i = 0; i < numberOfPoints; i++)
00751    {
00752       input[0] = time[i];
00753       output = multilayerPerceptron->calculateOutput(input);
00754       acceleration = output[0];
00755       deceleration = output[1];
00756       
00757       // Acceleration
00758 
00759       if(acceleration < 0.0)
00760       {
00761          acceleration = 0.0;
00762       }
00763       else if(acceleration > maximumAcceleration)
00764       {
00765          acceleration = maximumAcceleration;         
00766       }
00767       
00768       // Deceleration
00769 
00770       if(deceleration < -1.0*maximumDeceleration)
00771       {
00772          deceleration = -1.0*maximumDeceleration;
00773       }
00774       else if(deceleration > 0.0)
00775       {
00776          deceleration = 0.0;         
00777       }
00778 
00779       // Write time, trajectory and control signal to file   
00780 
00781       file << time[i] << " " 
00782            << position[i] << " "
00783            << velocity[i] << " "
00784            << acceleration << " " 
00785            << deceleration << std::endl;   
00786    }   
00787 
00788    file.close();
00789 }

00792 // void print(void) method
00793 
00802 
00803 void CarProblem::print()
00804 {
00805    // Evaluate performance
00806 
00807    // Solve state equations 
00808 
00809    Vector<double> time;
00810    Vector<double> position;
00811    Vector<double> velocity;
00812 
00813    Vector<double> independentParameters 
00814    = multilayerPerceptron->getIndependentParameters();
00815 
00816    double initialTime = 0.0;
00817    double finalTime = independentParameters[0];
00818 
00819    if(finalTime < 0.0)
00820    {
00821       finalTime = 0.0;             
00822    }
00823 
00824    int numberOfPoints = 
00825    ordinaryDifferentialEquations.calculateRungeKuttaFehlbergIntegral(*this,
00826    time, position, velocity, 
00827    &CarProblem::calculatePositionDot,
00828    &CarProblem::calculateVelocityDot,
00829    initialTime, finalTime, initialPosition, initialVelocity);
00830 
00831    // Obtain final position and velocity errors
00832 
00833    double finalPositionError 
00834    = fabs(finalPositionGoal - position[numberOfPoints-1]);
00835 
00836    double finalVelocityError 
00837    = fabs(finalVelocityGoal - velocity[numberOfPoints-1]);
00838 
00839    std::cout << "Final position error: " << finalPositionError << std::endl      
00840            << "Final velocity error: " << finalVelocityError << std::endl
00841            << "Final time: " << finalTime << std::endl;
00842 }
